attributes.action: Reduce VAT on replacement, energy efficient windows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would be much easier & cheaper to adminster than the current proposal for a "window scrappage scheme".  It would also not be open to abuse by disreputable companies, as the current proposal could be.
It would be fair and enable customers to replace old, inefficient windows at a lower cost while not incurring needless administration.
